name: Yobot Run - retro runner platform
description:
A new kind of platform runner game you can play. Yobot Run plays as a side-scrolling, auto-runner platformer game. The player controls Yobot as he automatically runs from left to right, jumping on his own to clear small gaps or obstacles. Yobot is an acrobatic spy robot. The robot manufacturing plant is in danger. But Yobot can save. Yobot constantly runs forward, while you time your taps to pull off stylish jumps and moves to gather coins and reach the goal!
To run away from enemies and dodge the obstacles using the halt feature. In Yobot timing is everything. Find the keys open the gates. Lots of platforming obstacles.

Features:

  • 8-bit retro style graphics and animations
  • Retro chiptune music and sounds
  • 50 levels
    -Gamepad support
Keys

Jump key: Left Alt, Mouse 0 or gamepad A
Stop key: Left Ctrl, Mouse 1 or gamepad X
